GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v4.19.264
GSD.description:
drm/msm/dsi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.264 by commit 4e5587cddb334f7a5bb1c49ea8bbfc966fafe1b8, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit a689554ba6ed81cf606c16539f6ffc2a1dcdaf8e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/dsi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
